name: Weapon Systems Down
description:
This is a space shooter, where your gun does not work!

Zigzag and circle your blue square ship around the incoming enemy ships. Gain points by making them crash into each other, but BEWARE some enemy ships have guns! Dash away from enemy fire to trick them into shooting their own.

Show this alien platoon that you can put up a good fight (even when your weapon systems are down)

YOU WILL STRUGGLE TO PLAY THIS GAME WITHOUT USING THE DASH BUTTON!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[CONTROLS]

Arrow Keys: Movement
Space bar (while moving): Short Dash
